author: cnbc.com
title: Senomyx Sets Fourth Quarter and Fiscal Year 2017 Earnings Call for Thursday, March 8, 2018 at 5:00 p.m. ET
text:
SAN DIEGO, Feb. 27, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Senomyx, Inc. (NASDAQ: SNMX) , a leading company using proprietary taste science technologies to discover, develop, and commercialize novel flavor ingredients and natural high intensity sweeteners, will hold a conference call on Thursday, March 8, 2018 at 5:00 p.m. Eastern time to discuss its financial results for the fourth quarter and full year ended December 31, 2017. Financial results will be issued in a press release prior to the call.
Senomyx management will host the conference call, followed by a question and answer period.
Date: Thursday, March 8, 2018
Time: 5:00 p.m. Eastern time (2:00 p.m. Pacific time)
U.S. dial-in number: 844-825-0514
International number: 315-625-6892
Conference ID: 2684448
Please call the conference telephone number 5-10 minutes prior to the start time. An operator will register your name and organization. If you have any difficulty connecting with the conference call, please contact Liolios Group at 949-574-3860.
The conference call will be broadcast live and available for replay here and via the investor relations section of the company's website .
About Senomyx, Inc.
Senomyx discovers novel flavor ingredients and natural high intensity sweeteners that allow food and beverage companies to create better-for-you products. Under its direct sales program, Senomyx sells its Complimyx 速 brand flavor ingredients, Sweetmyx 速 , Savorymyx 速 , and Bittermyx 速 , to flavor companies for use in a wide variety of foods and beverages. In addition, Senomyx has partnerships with leading global food, beverage, and ingredient supply companies, which are currently marketing products that contain Senomyx's flavor ingredients. For more information, please visit www.senomyx.com .
